library.description: This is an library with a wide range of books

chapter.title: Chapter 1
chapter.summary: beautiful and distinguished family. A private island. A brilliant, damaged girl; a passionate, political boy.

chapter.title: Chapter 2
chapter.summary: A group of four friends—the Liars—whose friendship turns destructive. A revolution. An accident. A secret. Lies upon lies. True love. The truth.

chapter.summary: We Were Liars is a modern, sophisticated suspense novel from New York Times bestselling author, National Book Award finalist, and Printz Award honoree E. Lockhart.

book.title: The Holy Bible: King James Version
book.author: Anonymous

chapter.title: Chapter 1
chapter.summary: An Award or Presentation Bible in the King James Version: ideal as a gift or to keep The full text of the Popular size King James or Authorized Version Bible, in a straightforward black imitation leather hardback binding.
